knimeNode.name: AddModality
knimeNode.shortDescription: Add the new modality data to the GCN Dataset with the output of the GCNDatasetBuilder node and the output from the AdditionalModalityPreprocessor node as input

fullDescription.intro: Add the new modality data to the GCN Dataset with the output of the GCNDatasetBuilder node and the output from the AdditionalModalityPreprocessor node as input

ports.inPort: Modality data list of each molecule.
